# Welcome! {.unnumbered}

Welcome to the Open Soil Spectral Library (OSSL) manual!

The OSSL is a public and growing dataset that is compiled by the [Soil Spectroscopy for Global Good](https://soilspectroscopy.org/) initiative.

A [peer-reviewed and open-access publication](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0296545) is available for additional reference.

Please navigate to the different sections to learn more about:

- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [About](#sec-about): Our team, OSSL resources, contributors, citation, and other information.
- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [Soil Spectroscopy](#sec-soilspec): Soil spectroscopy in general, predictive modeling, imported soil spectral libraries, instruments and software.
- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [Database description](#sec-db-desc): Database definitions, including variable names, types, human-readable description, and example values.
- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [Database access](#sec-db-access): Ways of accessing the OSSL.
- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [Neospectra database](#sec-neospectra): Data, models, and studies from a low-cost NIR scanner.
- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [Predictive models](#sec-prediction-models): Fitted models with the OSSL.
- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [Web services](#sec-web-services): User-friendly and online applications.
- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [Hands-on tutorial](#sec-tutorial): Training materials.
- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [Scientific publications](#sec-publications): Papers that our team or collaborators have published.
- `r emoji::emoji("blue_book")` [References](#sec-references).
